name: Crowded (Simone Cicchetti)
description:
Run around, avoid death, shoot enemies, avoid death AGAIN and be careful not to touch anything!

Game made for the Ludum Dare 42 Compo. Theme was "Running out of Space".

Compo means that I had to make all assets by myself in 48 hours. All assets you see in-game, besides the Font used, are self made. Visit the Ludum Dare project page for more details and, if you are interested, feel free to leave a comment!
